data.message: HelLo, how can I report abusive / life treathis comments to my comment. By this abusive comment, there is no X sign nor Report button. Please help.

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Kasia. If you feel you're in immediate danger, please contact your local authorities. Depending on the seriousness of the situation, you can learn more about the tools Facebook offers to help you deal with bullying and harassment here: http://bit.ly/1Mw666S. You can also find more information, tools and resources on our Bullying Prevention Hub here: http://bit.ly/1ScxDcP. -Jordan

I know your help toll and I tried to use report button but there is no such a thing by this particular comment. I will contact police but I think you should know about and should do something about as well. That's all. Please if you can provide some other ways to report that comment to also prevent that person from doing more harms, that would be helpful.
Facebook tu doit plus l'aimer qu'avant
